Package com.github.anastaciocintra.escpos

Class EscPos

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.anastaciocintra.escpos.EscPos
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EscPosConst, Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
    public class EscPos
extends Object
implements Closeable, Flushable, EscPosConst
    Write some usual ESC/POS commands to the OutPutStream.

    ESC/POS was developed by Seiko Epson Corporation

    Most receipt printers on the market recognize these commands.

    and can be used to print texts, barcodes or images

      • setCharacterCodeTable

        public EscPos setCharacterCodeTable​(EscPos.CharacterCodeTable table)
                             throws IOException,
                                    IllegalArgumentException
        Select character code table.

        each table represent specifics codes for special characters, example when we need to print accents characters. This function combine setCharsetName to be used on String.getBytes and setPrinterCharacterTable to be used on printer. Then next time that you call write with String parameter, then you can send special characters.

        Parameters:
        table - character table possibilities
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        IllegalArgumentException - if characterCodeTable out of range 0 to 255

      • setPrinterCharacterTable

        public EscPos setPrinterCharacterTable​(int characterCodeTable)
                                throws IOException,
                                       IllegalArgumentException
        Select character code table on the printer.

        Is recommended that you use setCharacterCodeTable, but if you need to use one specific code that is not included in CharacterCodeTable or if the CharacterCodeTable codes diverges of your printer documentation, then you should use this function.

        ASCII ESC t n

        Parameters:
        characterCodeTable - code of table on printer to be selected.
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        IllegalArgumentException - if characterCodeTable out of range 0 to 255

      • write

        public EscPos write​(Style style,
                    String text)
             throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                    IOException
        Write String to outputStream.

        Configure Style by with ESC/POS commands, encode String by charsetName and write to outputStream.

        Parameters:
        style - text style to be used.
        text - content to be encoded and write to outputStream.
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - If the named charset is not supported
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs. In particular, an IOException is thrown if the output stream is closed.
        See Also:
        setCharsetName(java.lang.String)

      • write

        public EscPos write​(PrintModeStyle printModeStyle,
                    String text)
             throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                    IOException
        Write String to outputStream.

        Configure printModeStyle by with ESC/POS commands, encode String by charsetName and write to outputStream.

        Parameters:
        printModeStyle - - text style to be used.
        text - - content to be encoded and write to outputStream.
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - If the named charset is not supported
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs. In particular, an IOException is thrown if the output stream is closed.
        See Also:

      • feed

        public EscPos feed​(Style style,
                   int nLines)
            throws IOException,
                   IllegalArgumentException
        Prints the data in the print buffer and feeds n lines.

        ASCII ESC d

        Parameters:
        style - to be used on line spacing
        nLines - number of lines
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        IllegalArgumentException - if nLines out of range 0 to 255

        public EscPos initializePrinter()
                         throws IOException

        reset style of this object. ASCII ESC @

        Returns:
        this object
        Throws:

      • pulsePin

        public EscPos pulsePin​(EscPos.PinConnector pinConnector,
                       int t1,
                       int t2)
                throws IOException,
                       IllegalArgumentException
        Generate pulse.

        ASCII ESC p m t1 t2

        The pulse for ON time is(t1 2 msec) and for OFF time is(t2 2 msec) .

        Parameters:
        pinConnector - specifies pin 2 or pin 5
        t1 - time one
        t2 - time two
        Returns:
        this object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        IllegalArgumentException - if t1 or t2 out of range 0 to 255
